name: RAG Query Processing System
goal: Process user queries using RAG to retrieve and generate accurate responses

sub_agents.name: MainAgent
sub_agents.description: Central agent that manages the overall query processing flow
sub_agents.goal: Coordinate all sub-agents to process user query effectively

sub_agents.name: QueryAugmentor
sub_agents.description: Enhances and refines user queries for better processing
sub_agents.goal: Improve query quality using various analysis techniques

sub_agents.name: TaskOrchestrator
sub_agents.description: Breaks down queries into manageable tasks
sub_agents.goal: Decompose complex queries into actionable tasks

sub_agents.name: RetrievalPlanner
sub_agents.description: Creates retrieval plans for each task
sub_agents.goal: Generate effective retrieval strategies for each task

sub_agents.name: InformationRetriever
sub_agents.description: Gathers information based on retrieval plans
sub_agents.goal: Retrieve relevant information using various tools

sub_agents.name: ResponseEvaluator
sub_agents.description: Evaluates the quality of generated responses

sub_agents.name: ResponseGatherer
sub_agents.description: Collects responses from database for final processing
sub_agents.goal: Aggregate all relevant information for response generation

tools.name: query_analyzer
tools.description: Analyzes queries using different techniques for efficient processing

tools.name: task_breaker
tools.description: Breaks user queries into different tasks for efficient handling

tools.name: plan_generator
tools.description: Generates perfect plans for each task

tools.name: information_gatherer
tools.description: Uses different tools to gather information based on planned strategies

tools.name: response_evaluator
tools.description: Evaluates LLM-generated responses based on assigned tasks

workflows.name: QueryProcessingWorkflow
workflows.description: End-to-end workflow for processing user queries using RAG

steps.description: Receive and analyze user query for RAG processing
Augment and refine the query using advanced analysis techniques
Break down the query into manageable tasks
Generate retrieval plans for each task
Retrieve information based on generated plans
Store step-wise responses in database based on plans and tasks
Gather all responses from database for processing
Evaluate the quality of generated response
Refine and optimize the final response
